sent.orig: I hear nobody is coming in, and if nobody is coming in, nobody can leave.
sent.trans: 我听说没人会来，如果没人来，就不会有人离开。

sent.orig: An original writer is not one who imitates nobody, but one whom nobody can imitate.
sent.trans: 独创的作家不是不模仿他人，而是他人都无法模仿他。

sent.orig: Nobody can stem those currents, just as nobody benefits if the boat goes under.
sent.trans: 没有能逆流而行，就像没有人能从翻船中获取好处一样。

sent.orig: Wang Ho-fu said cynically, If nobody ever went broke, nobody would ever make a fortune!
sent.trans: 王和甫淡淡地说：没有人破产，哪里会有人发财！

sent.orig: Nobody knows it.Nobody will be the wiser.
sent.trans: 谁也不知道。谁也不会知道。
